revised_title: Photochemical Decomposition of Dicumyl Peroxide and Cumene Hydroperoxide in Solution
tldr: The photochemical decomposition of dicumyl peroxide and cumene hydroperoxide in solution was investigated by R. G. W. Norrish and M. H. Searby. They studied the reaction mechanisms and quantum yields of the decomposition in two solvents, carbon tetrachloride and n-hexane. The authors found that the main products of the decomposition depend on the solvent used, and they discussed the technical challenges they faced during their experiments.
